moves.name: Smog
moves.description: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. It may also poison the target.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Ember
moves.description: The target is attacked with small flames. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Ember
moves.description: The target is attacked with small flames. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Smokescreen
moves.description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. It reduces the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Feint Attack
moves.description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

moves.name: Fire Spin
moves.description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

moves.name: Clear Smog
moves.description: The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All status changes are returned to normal.

moves.name: Flame Burst
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

moves.name: Fire Punch
moves.description: The target is punched with a fiery fist. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Lava Plume
moves.description: An inferno of scarlet flames torches everything around the user. It may leave targets with a burn.

moves.name: Sunny Day
moves.description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Fire Blast
moves.description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.
